resources.string:
Structure Rules FAQs Register About Event
ROUND 1: Multiple Choice Questions.
ROUND 2: Questions based on identifying the scenes or dialogues, characters or relatable stuff. Similar questions based on videos, audios, signs etc.
Elimination criteria: Anyone who scores 20/30+ would proceed for Round 2.
Team and fee structure Team size : Maximum 2 per team. Registration fee : â‚¹99 per team per show.
Structure Rules FAQs Register Rules
1. You can attempt FANDOM quiz of one show ONLY ONCE.
2. If a team is caught cheating or playing by unfair means then the team will be disqualified.
3. Participants should report to the venue on time and must attend the quiz in the given slot only.
4. The decision of the respective Quiz Head will be final and will not be subjected to any change.
5. Replacement of any participant is strictly not allowed.
